name: com.northernrogue.cccp.spacetimedbserver
displayName: Cosmos Cove Control Panel for SpacetimeDB
description: SpacetimeDB is a combined database and server designed for building performant Massively Multiplayer Online games and applications with unprecedented ease. Cosmos Cove Control Panel is an unofficial integration that streamlines the SpacetimeDB experience within Unity, making server management a breeze.

samples.description: Contains sample server code written in Rust for an import reducer allowing you to import your database with the Database window
